channel.title: NPC Drops
channel.description: Hey guys. I wanna take out the rares from my shops. Like Furys, Santas, Masks, Phats, God Swords. You no. So i found a spot for the kbd's. But i wanna make em drop what i want. And How rare it is to get the item. If you can tell me thx alot. I will love you :D

item.dc:creator: @xx_Santa_pker_xX xx Santa pker xX
item.description:
@xx_Santa_pker_xX wrote:

Can you tell me where to add it? :S…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2008, 09:18:44 PM[/size][hr]Lol nvm got it…thx alot

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

npcdrop = 391 995 10000 100

first number is npc id
second is item you want it to drop
third is amount you want it to drop
fourth is how often you want it to drop

for kbd just find id and edit the numbers

Read full topic
